text: Tesla, Inc. is an American automotive and energy company founded by Martin Eberhard and Marc Tarpenning in 2003. The company specializes in electric vehicles, battery energy storage, and solar panels. Tesla's primary products include the Model S, Model 3, Model X, and Model Y cars. In 2015, Tesla launched the Powerwall, a rechargeable lithium-ion battery integration for home energy storage. The company is led by CEO Elon Musk and is headquartered in Austin, Texas. Tesla acquired SolarCity in 2016 to expand its renewable energy capabilities.

In late 2025, Swiggy expanded its operations into drone delivery trials in Bengaluru, partnering with Garuda Aerospace. This initiative, dubbed 'Swiggy Air', aims to reduce delivery times for rush-hour orders. Additionally, Swiggy launched a new 'Healthy Hub' category focusing on curated nutritious meals.
